mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contacts (first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, address) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR phone_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE contacts SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
